title: The Silenced
description: In a world filled with sanctions and restrictions, Marena struggles to remember the past: a time before the Zero Tolerance Party murdered her mother and put her father under house arrest. A time before they installed listening devices in every home and forbade citizens to read or write. A time when she was free. In the spirit of her revolutionary mother, Marena forms her own resistance groupâ€”the White Rose.This is a chilling dystopian novel that leads readers to question the very essence of their identities. Who do you think you are?
author: James DeVita
